page.title: 18THORNBURY HOSPITAL
page.content: Thornbury Hospital was built in 1850. Seventy five per cent of the staff working there are part time, staff nurses and domestic staff.The hospital basically caters for old people.Mrs Prosser is the patient who has been in the hospital the longest, twenty four years altogether.She is ninety one years old and was born in Chipping Sodbury. Clara Sage was the oldest patient the hospital ever had, she was one hundred and five years old.The grounds around the hospital altogether are about three acres.The Berwick Unit caters for mentally handicapped people who are old.
